name: Basketball 2 (HammerBro, jraido)
description:
Jump, shoot, dunk and kill in this logical successor to '80s b-ball.

Remappable controls, gamepad support, up to 4 players.

Default Controls

D-PAD / WADS / Joystick: Move character.
Shift / L: Turbo. You'll want to hold this a lot.
E / XBOX-X: Grab / Pass
R: Shove
Space / XBOX-A: Jump / Shoot
Tab / XBOX-Y: Swap Player
Start: Join game (additional players only)

How to Dunk

Have ball. Be sprinting toward hoop. Press jump. % chance that increases as the match nears completion.

Shoot like a Pro

Press Space again at the peak of your jump for maximum accuracy.
